mapper.sql: id, user_account_name, user_account, bq_name, user_type, user_type_name, dept_id, telephone, dept_name, position_name, np_position_name, rylx, yggh, gh_hk, sex_name, qualify_no, birthday, school_date, zyjsgw, bianhao_jx, zyjsgw_lc, xcszyjzc, appointed_date, appointed_date_lc, zizu, yuangongzu, xrgwjb, xrgwjbprsj, zhicheng, zyjs_np, zyjs_date_np, zyjs_npjx, zyjs_date_npjx, edu, edu_school, guoji, minzu, jiguan, political_status, bianhao_lc, xingzhengjiebie, id_card, work_date, yishi_lb, yishi_jb, yishi_zhiyefanwei, yishi_zgzsbianhao, yishi_ziyebianhao, renshizifw, renshizfenlei, is_authority, file_id, IsUse, file_url, patent_good, patent_ranknum, state, IS_DELETEMARK, CREATE_TIME, display_index, MODIFY_TIME, CREATE_USER_ID, MODIFY_USER_ID, auditMan, auditManName, auditDate, auditSuggestion, file_id_lc, file_url_lc, dept_new, doc_type, chujikh_date, is_zhongjikh, zhongjikh_date, staff_date, picture_id, picture_url, gqpxqk, gfhyspxqk, zjspnlceqk, dca_year
